title: BONUS: N.O.R.E. Addresses Ye Drink Champs Backlash; 'I Regret It'
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
N.O.R.E. joined Ebro in the Morning today (Oct. 17) to address the backlash from his most recent Drink Champs interview with Kanye West aka Ye. 

Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon. 

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/captains-majors-the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic/id1644231857
